extendedInfo.description: The international bestseller is now available for Android! Engage in a cutthroat competition to collect the largest stockpile of delicious fish while outmaneuvering other penguins on a rapidly shrinking ice floe. Hey, Thatâs My Fish! brings the classic strategy board game of ravenous penguins searching for sustenance to Android phones and tablets! Play against the computer or compete with up to three friends in a fun-filled race against time. With a variety of maps to choose from and nearly infinite starting setups, Hey, Thatâs My Fish! offers endless hours of fun. Can you supply your colony with enough food to win the day, or will your cunning opponent leave you drifting out at sea?CRITICAL RESPONSE"As a casual strategy game, Hey, That's My Fish! is easy to recommend." 4/5 stars from 148apps.com"Fast-paced and well-suited for the touch screen"4/5 stars from Gamezebo.com"Whenever I've introduced the game to friends they've all walked away impressed." 4.5/5 stars from Android Game Reviews

reviews.comment: A fun little game based on the board game. Great for playing with the kids when you need to wait and they are restless. Easy to understand and easy to play.
reviews.author: Clayton Kessler

reviews.title: Fun quick game
reviews.comment: Easy to learn, quick to play, fun strategy for placement and moves
reviews.author: Jay Nestle

reviews.title: Fantastic adaptation of a great game
reviews.comment: I am a big fan of the boardgame version of this, which is how I was originally introduced to the game. It is easy enough to explain to even young children, but once you get the hang of how the game works can become quite strategic. My main issue with the physical game was that it took nearly as long to set up the fish tiles as it would to play the game - that lone issue with it has been solved, making this a nearly perfect play experience for all. Played on a Nook HD+.
reviews.author: Steve Warfield

reviews.comment: Lovely adaptation, shame about the ai
reviews.author: Lachlan Fraser

reviews.title: Great adaptation
reviews.comment: This is a great adaptation of a great game. Graphics are pretty and fits very well. The game itself was perfect for digital devices from the beginning and is rarely brought out now that we have it on the tablet. It is clearly optimized for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better now
reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing permissions.  No more lockups so far with latest update. Overall fun game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great some devices
reviews.comment: Works well on my Galaxy S. I get a blue ice field on my Lenovo pad. Same blue field on a side loaded Amazon Fire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Something Different!
reviews.comment: Tired of tossing birds, cutting ropes and getting water to a shower? This is a perfect example of how to be different. It\'s a game of pure strategy with no luck involved. The rules are very easy to learn, but you must plan your moves carefully. While the graphics are cute, this is a game all ages will enjoy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun.
reviews.comment: Great little game. Easier to play than the tabletop version. My 6 year old adores it!
reviews.author: David Munro

reviews.title: Simple, Engaging Strategy
reviews.comment: A great, simple, and quick strategy game made very well for touch.
reviews.author: Ryan Kroetch

reviews.title: Only on-line multiplayer missing...
reviews.comment: Great adaptation otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Fun and quick game to play. Great for puzzle and strategy lovers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game and prefect adaption
reviews.comment: Hooray for changed permissions! Good job devs. This is a little gem of a strategy game. Fast gameplay allows for instant fun anywhere. Great on both phone and tablet. Well worth it\'s price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My fish
reviews.comment: Brilliant game, deceptively simple, highly addictive.
reviews.author: David Campbell

reviews.title: Fun, works great!
reviews.comment: I had played the board game, and this is a perfectly executed app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hey, its my fish too y\'know!
reviews.comment: I love this game! I have a hard copy and now I can take it with me too. Awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quick and fun
reviews.comment: This has become my favorite game to pick up and play for a few minutes.  It has the perfect balance of strategy and simplicity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ottimo!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful simplicity
reviews.comment: Perfect example of turning a simple abstract strategy game into animated fun. A board that disappears as you play - brilliant! Not hard to beat the AI; just the same, this is a keeper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Love it! We need more board game ports!
reviews.author: A Google User
